nodes.text: Giggek was a Mustafarian male who lived on the planet Mustafar during the Imperial Era. Following the Battle of Endor and the death of the Sith Lord Darth Vader in 4 ABY, Giggek convinced his friend Tuttel to journey within Vader's fortress together and destroy it with explosives. Inside, the duo encountered the Dark Lord's ferocious servant Vaneé, who trapped Giggek within the castle. The young boy decided to sacrifice himself so that Tuttel could escape, activating the explosives and causing enough damage to the castle's structure to trap both himself and Vaneé within the rubble.
